definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: You should never pay for your children's work.
sentences.chinese: 你从不应该为孩子的劳动而付给他们用度。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金额个人货物款的一个好处是它不需要确认信用度。

sentences.english: He has a big family and many expenses.
Boss,we spent more on electricity this month than in a year.
sentences.chinese: 老板，这个月公司的电费已经超过平常一年的用度了。

sentences.english: Normally, packing charge is included in the contract price.
sentences.chinese: 一般地，合同价格中已经包括了包装用度。

sentences.english: he who pays the piper calls the tune.
sentences.chinese: 他谁负担用度调用词调。

sentences.english: Basic types of high endurance punches along with the conditions are presented.
sentences.chinese: 列出了高耐用度凸模的主要类型及其采用的条件。

sentences.english: Would you like to put it on your hotel bill?
sentences.chinese: 您准备将这个用度记到您饭店的总帐吗？

sentences.english: The above cost can be deducted from the rent when it is due next time.
sentences.chinese: 用度能够鄙人次付房钱地时分扣除。

sentences.english: Managed debt is actually good, and builds up your credit rating.
sentences.chinese: 被计划好的欠债是好的，它能帮助建立你的信用度。

sentences.english: The north of Thailand looks more like China, in every aspect, food, costume, behaviors, etc.
sentences.chinese: 泰北已经很象中国了，不管是吃穿用度。

sentences.english: Reverse suede and full-grain leather upper for durability.
sentences.chinese: 反绒面革和全粒面皮革鞋面，提供良好的耐用度。

sentences.english: Do you incur ATM fees because your bank's machines are not convenient?
sentences.chinese: 你是否由于银行取款机不方便而要支付ATM用度呢？

sentences.english: App Engine costs nothing to get started.
sentences.chinese: 应用步骤引擎的用度没有开端。

sentences.english: On major planning items contain estimation of cost and construction schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要的计划工作项目包括用度预算和施工进度。

definition: land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
funds and provisions for the troops/(soldier's) pay
